name: oil power plant construction, 500MW | oil power plant, 500MW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6179/documentation

Infrastructure with a life time of 30 years, 65% employment and 38% efficiency.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Infrastructure of a power plant with 500MW including materials, energy use for construction, disposal and land use.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Data based on old literature data. Material use might be underestimated due to new flue gas treatment facilities.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Material split derived from a 800Mw plant in the US with electrostatic particle filter, desulphurisation unit, effluent treatment, sludge dewatering and waste management.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Some data of a coal power plant have been used for comparison.
